name: Die, Ghost!
description:
**THIS GAME REQUIRES TWO GAMEPADS AND TWO PLAYERS TO PLAY**

After centuries of sharing the graveyard with a lesser ghost, you've grown tired of the unwanted company. It's time to rid your afterlife of that good-for-nothing once and for all. Find and dig up their bones before yours are found to rule the graveyard by yourself and finally put the peace back into Rest In Peace.
